criterion: Provides ICD-10 code for the vaccination encounter
Provides CPT codes for the vaccine administration plus extended counseling
Correctly states the vaccines administered (MMR and Varicella)
Correctly states the duration of counseling (approximately 15 minutes)
Includes the child's age (2 years old) in the response
Mentions the normal heart rate and temperature of the child
Correctly states that there were no complaints from the child
Uses natural language and correct interpretation
Provides too little information, such as only mentioning the vaccines administered without additional context
Incorrectly states the duration of counseling or the child's age
